description: This walk ties together the Braeside, Grand Canyon, Evans Lookout, Cliff Top Track, Govetts Leap, and Popes Glen in a loop around Blackheath's attractions.

markers.description: Get the train to Blackheath using transportnsw.info.
From the station entrance cross at the traffic lights and follow the Great Western Highway to the right.
At the intersection follow the signs to Govetts Leap to the left.
At the intersection with Boreas Street, follow the signs to the Braeside Walk to the right.
At the intersection with the Braeside Trail, turn right and follow the fire trail past the park gates.
At the trailhead of the Braeside Walk, follow the sign to Evans Lookout continuing along the firetrail.
At the end of the firetrail follow Evans Lookout Road to the left.
Enter Neates Glen Parking area on the right side of the road.
From the Neats Glen Parking Area follow the signs to the Grand Canyon Walking Track
Follow the stairs all the way down into the canyon to the creek crossing.
After crossing Greaves Creek, follows the signs to Evans Lookout.
At the intersection with Rodriguez Pass Walking Track, follow the sign up to Evans Lookout.
At the lookout, follow the walking paths along the viewing platforms to the carpark.
From the toilet block near the end of the carpark, follow the signs to Govetts Leap Lookout.
At the intersection with the Braeside Walk, cross the creek and continue along the Cliff Top Track.
From the trailhead near the toilet blocks follow the signs to Popes Glen.
From the falls at the intersection with Pulpit Rock Track, follow the signs to Blackheath Station and Village to the left.
Someone thought so highly of this tiny swimming spot, that it deserved the signage.
markers.title: Technically this is a beach.
markers.instruction: <center>Visit this location to earn the mystery trophy</center>

markers.description: At the end of the track follow Dell Street to the left.
From the carpark at the bottom of Memorial Park, follows the signs to Blackheath Station through the park.
From the park entrance, follow Gardiner Crescent to the left.
At the intersection with Govetts Leap Road, follow the sign to Blackheath Station to the right.
From the intersection follow the Great Western Highway to the right towards the train station.
Cross the the Great Western Highway at the station entrance.
Plan your return trip from Blackheath at transportnsw.info.
